NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
December 18, 1952
Mr* Frank Sehooley
WILL, University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank;
I am enclosing Mrs* Evans* secretarial bill for the
last month but have a question or two to raise concerning it*
Actually, this amount will be divided among two people here
and I am wondering if it would not be wise in the future, because
of income tax complications, to send two separate bills on it*
Let me know what you think about it*
Jim called this morning concerning the Skornia appoint- .
ment* I relayed to him several reactions which I should like to
pass on to you and one which I did not give to Jim* In the first
place, I would vote for Harry Skornia for this job if he is
available by June 1, 1953* I do not think, however, that we
should hold it open longer than that* In the event we do secure
Skornia*s services, I would suggest that you, and you alone, be
responsible for supervision of the headquarters operation* Jim
suggested that he and you combined would be responsible for
getting the job done, but I cannot conceive of a division of
services on the supervisory level which would be satisfactory.
Therefore, sir, I would insist that you be named Acting Executive
Director and that you be given adequate remuneration for this
assignment and that you employ whomever you wish to be responsible
for carrying out your directives at whatever salary you think
necessaiy*
In the event Harry is not interested or cannot be
available by June 1, we still should get somebody on the job*
I should like to reconstruct the committee for hiring an
Executive Director appointing you chairman of that committee
and asking Dick to work with you on it* Burton has indicated
that he is too tied up to be active and you may or may not know
that Allen Miller is on leave for several months for some
special nVoice‚Äù assignment and I hear by the grapevine that he
may take a year or two*s leave* Assuming that you will accept
the job of chairman of that committee, will you plow full steam
ahead for a replacement? If Skornia cannot take the job, look
into John Greenlee at Iowa State and start looking for new names*
